select (Select t_code from dpartcode_dbt where t_codekind=14 and t_partyid=RSB_KERNEL.GetSelfId()) as sbidnt, (Select t_code from dpartcode_dbt where t_codekind=3 and t_partyid=RSB_KERNEL.GetSelfId()) as BIC, dep.t_FNCash as fNCash, case when t_bankid = 0 then t_namebranch else to_char(t_bankid) end AS region, case when t_bankid != 0 then substr(t_namebranch,0,(select instr(t_namebranch,'/') from dlistfdep_dbt dep2 where dep2.t_namebranch = dep.t_namebranch)-1) end AS branch, case when t_bankid !=0 then substr(t_namebranch, (select instr(t_namebranch,'/') from dlistfdep_dbt dep2 where dep2.t_namebranch = dep.t_namebranch)+1, (select length(t_namebranch) from dlistfdep_dbt dep2 where dep2.t_namebranch = dep.t_namebranch)) end as office, replace(t_Desc, chr(1),'') as tname, replace(t_PostAdress,chr(1),'') as postAdress, replace(t_Phone,chr(1),'') as phone from dlistfdep_dbt dep where ((t_Desc is not null) and (replace(t_Desc, chr(1),'')!=' ')) AND (((dep.t_namebranch like '%'||:region||'%' OR :region IS NULL) AND dep.t_bankid = 0) OR ((dep.t_bankid like '%'||:region||'%' OR :region IS NULL) AND dep.t_bankid != 0)) AND (((substr(t_namebranch,0,(select instr(t_namebranch,'/') from dlistfdep_dbt dep2 where dep2.t_namebranch = dep.t_namebranch)-1) LIKE '%'||:branch||'%' OR :branch IS NULL) AND (dep.t_bankid != 0)) OR (dep.t_bankid = 0 AND :branch IS NULL)) AND (((substr(t_namebranch, (select instr(t_namebranch,'/') from dlistfdep_dbt dep2 where dep2.t_namebranch = dep.t_namebranch)+1, (select length(t_namebranch) from dlistfdep_dbt dep2 where dep2.t_namebranch = dep.t_namebranch)) LIKE '%'||:office||'%' OR :office IS NULL) AND (dep.t_bankid != 0)) OR (dep.t_bankid = 0 AND :office IS NULL)) AND (upper(dep.t_desc) LIKE '%'||upper(:name)||'%' OR :name IS NULL)
order by fNCash
